resources.string: Please create a PIN so that only you can access the app

This game is all about getting to know your partner better when it comes to sex. Learn about each other\'s preferences, fantastic and take your new-found knowledge to the badroom (or perhaps somewhere else)!
Your answer 2 question and invite your partner to play
Your partner tries to guess your answers and gets points if guessed correctly. Your partner than answers 2 question
Now, it\'s your turn to guess your partner\'s answers and submit your own answers to 2 new questions
Find your partner in few seconds using Facebook
Some illustration here that illustrator finding the partner using Facebook
Please notice that we do not post anything on your wall or submit any data to Facebook. Gameplay data is kept strictly confidential.
It\'s your turn to go first. Answer the 2 questions truthfully and your game invite will be sent to your partner as a private message on Facebook
Some illustration here that illustrator something being sent ower to the partner
Remember to tell your partner that you want to play - to make sure that your partner installs the app
Now, it\'s your partner\'s turn to play. Wait for your fun. Then..
See how your partner tried to guess your answers
Guess how your partner answered his/her questions. You\'ll get points for each of your partner answers you can guess
Start another batch of question and continue until someones wins the round
First player to reach the round goal, wins the round
Winner of a round gets to select a "sexaul favor" which the loswer must perform
To get started, login using Facebook
